event.title: was estimated to be around 64,350 in 2010

data.event: Its population was estimated to be around 64,350 in 2010.

event.title: boasts a large Hakka minority to this day

data.event: Like Papar, Malaysia, Beaufort was one of the major initial Hakka population centres in Sabah and boasts a large Hakka minority to this day.

event.title: a battle between Japanese and Australian forces in late June

data.event: During World War II, it was the site of a battle between Japanese and Australian forces in late June 1945.
